web.homepage.tagline1.en: Paste a password, secret message or private link below.
web.homepage.tagline1.translation: Spodaj prilepite geslo, skrivno sporočilo ali zasebno povezavo.

web.homepage.tagline2.en: Keep sensitive info out of your email and chat logs.
web.homepage.tagline2.translation: Ohranite občutljive informacije izven svoje e-pošte in dnevnikov klepeta.

web.homepage.secret_hint.en: * A secret link only works once and then disappears forever.
web.homepage.secret_hint.translation: * Skrivna povezava deluje samo enkrat in nato izgine za vedno.

web.homepage.secret_form_more_text3.en: and be able to send the secret by email.
web.homepage.secret_form_more_text3.translation: in lahko pošljete skrivnost po e-pošti.

web.homepage.cta_title.translation: Povečajte zaupanje in delite z zaupanjem

web.homepage.cta_subtitle.en: Elevate your brand and share with confidence
web.homepage.cta_subtitle.translation: Dvignite svojo blagovno znamko in delite z zaupanjem

web.homepage.need_free_account.en: Just getting started? Send emails with a free account.
web.homepage.need_free_account.translation: Šele začenjate? Pošiljajte e-pošto z brezplačnim računom.

web.homepage.password_generation_descrip.en: Click "Generate Password" to create a secure random password that you can share.
web.homepage.password_generation_descrip.translation: Kliknite "Generiraj geslo" za ustvarjanje varnega naključnega gesla, ki ga lahko delite.

web.homepage.protip1.en: Your message will self-destruct after being viewed. The link can only be accessed once.
web.homepage.protip1.translation: Vaše sporočilo se bo samouničilo po ogledu. Povezavo je mogoče dostopati samo enkrat.

web.homepage.authonly.tagline2.en: Secure messaging service is for internal use only.
web.homepage.authonly.tagline2.translation: Storitev za varno sporočanje je namenjena samo za notranjo uporabo.

web.homepage.authonly.tagline1.en: If you have an account, please log in to continue.
web.homepage.authonly.tagline1.translation: Če imate račun, se prijavite za nadaljevanje.

web.homepage.disabled.tagline2.en: This service is setup for internal use only.
web.homepage.disabled.tagline2.translation: Ta storitev je nastavljena samo za notranjo uporabo.

web.homepage.disabled.tagline1.en: User interface and login capabilities are not available.
web.homepage.disabled.tagline1.translation: Uporabniški vmesnik in možnosti prijave niso na voljo.

web.homepage.secure_your_brand_build_cus.en: Secure your brand, build customer trust with links from your domain.
web.homepage.secure_your_brand_build_cus.translation: Zavarujte svojo blagovno znamko, zgradite zaupanje strank s povezavami iz vaše domene.

web.homepage.a_trusted_way_to_share_sens.en: A trusted way to share sensitive information that self-destructs after being viewed.
web.homepage.a_trusted_way_to_share_sens.translation: Zaupanja vreden način deljenja občutljivih informacij, ki se samouniči po ogledu.

web.homepage.signup_individual_and_busin.translation: Registracija - Načrti za posameznike in podjetja

web.homepage.send_sensitive_information_.en: Send sensitive information that can only be viewed once
web.homepage.send_sensitive_information_.translation: Pošljite občutljive informacije, ki si jih je mogoče ogledati samo enkrat

web.homepage.this_is_a_private_instance_.en: This is a private instance. Only authorized team members can generate new secure links.
web.homepage.this_is_a_private_instance_.translation: To je zasebna instanca. Samo pooblaščeni člani ekipe lahko generirajo nove varne povezave.

web.homepage.onetime_secret_helps_us_sha.en: Onetime Secret helps us share sensitive information securely while maintaining our professional facade.
web.homepage.onetime_secret_helps_us_sha.translation: Onetime Secret nam pomaga varno deliti občutljive informacije, medtem ko ohranjamo našo profesionalno fasado.

web.homepage.information_shared_through_.en: Information shared through this service can only be accessed once. Once viewed, the content is permanently deleted to ensure confidentiality.
web.homepage.information_shared_through_.translation: Informacije, deljene preko te storitve, je mogoče dostopati samo enkrat. Ko so ogledane, je vsebina trajno izbrisana za zagotovitev zaupnosti.
